name: dulcet-intl
description: Internationalize Dulcet apps. This library provides Dulcet components and an API to format dates, numbers, and strings, including pluralization and handling translations.
author: NKDuy <kn145660@gmail.com>

scripts.clean: rimraf src/en.js coverage/ dist/ lib/ locale-data/
scripts.build:dist: npm run build:dist:dev && npm run build:dist:prod
scripts.build: npm run build:data && npm run build:lib && npm run build:dist
scripts.dulcet:14: npm run dulcet:clean && npm i dulcet@^0.14 dulcet-dom@^0.14 dulcet-addons-test-utils@^0.14
scripts.dulcet:15: npm run dulcet:clean && npm i dulcet@^15 dulcet-dom@^15 dulcet-addons-test-utils@^15
scripts.test: mocha --compilers js:babel-register --require babel-polyfill --require intl --recursive test/unit/ test/functional/
scripts.test:cov: babel-node $(npm bin)/isparta cover --report text --report html node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- --require babel-polyfill --require intl --recursive test/unit/ test/functional/
scripts.test:dulcet: npm run dulcet:14 && npm run test -- --reporter dot && npm run dulcet:15 && npm run test -- --reporter dot
scripts.test:all: npm run lint && npm run test:cov && npm run test:dulcet
scripts.preversion: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run test:all
scripts.postversion: echo 'Uninstall dulcet-router to fix npm issue' && npm uninstall dulcet-router
